Body: I want to buy Clash of Clans pro version and install it on my device. I found that this game has pro/premium version available. I went to Play Store to install it. I searched this game's pro version with queries  "clash of clans pro" and "clash of clans premium", but I only found the free version.So, how to find out the paid version of an app whose free version is available? Example: ES File Explorer has both free and paid versions available. Any easy way to find paid version?
Title: How to find a paid version of an app?

history.Text: i want to install clash of clans on my device.then i go to play store to install coc.i found this game pro/premium version available.so,i search this game pro version to purchase. then search like "clash of clans pro" / "clash of clans premium".but i only found free version.i want to buy coc pro.so,My question is how to found free version application paid version?ie:es file explorer are available two version free and paid.so any easy way to find paid version?
HOW TO FIND FREE APP PRO VERSION?
